item.title: Building a dataset for Fantasy Premier League analysis
item.description: The Fantasy Premier League API API data from previous seasons Combining data from the current season with data from previous seasons People often ask me if I have some sort of artificially intelligent algorithm assisting me with my Fantasy Premier League (FPL) team. Not because Iâ€™m particularly good at FPL, but because my day job is to develop data driven solutions to business problems.
